document_data.name: Maezaere Thallandrith
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Maezaere Thallandrith''' was a noblewoman of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}, Lady Maezaere Thallandrith was one of the guests of Lady [[Joysil Ambrur]] at [[Haelithtorntowers]] in [[Marsember]] in an evening in which the lady retired to her chambers early, dismissing her guests. Later that evening, she met with a host of other people, which included the [[Red Wizard]] [[Harnrim Starangh]].
